name: Arcane Barrier
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You project a wall of shimmering magic up to 25 feet wide, 10 feet tall, and 1 inch thick. You can orient this wall however you please, so long as the wall is totally contained within the range of the spell.

The wall is utterly indestructible and impassible. Nothing can go through it.
empower: Choose one - create two walls, or duration increased to 1 hour.
